option.name: originalMessage
option.value: Rename PostgresAsync to PgJinja and update references for consistency

option.name: rewordedMessage
option.value: Rename PostgresAsync to PgJinja and update references for consistency

task.summary:
Update README.md for improved readability
The README.md file was modified to enhance readability by adjusting line breaks in the project description. This change ensures that the text is more accessible and easier to read, especially in environments with limited line width.

Enhance README and add async database interaction
The README.md file has been expanded to include detailed usage instructions, installation steps, and configuration options for the pgjinja package. This update aims to provide users with a comprehensive guide on how to leverage the package's capabilities for asynchronous database operations using PostgreSQL, Jinja2 templates, and Pydantic models. Additionally, new files and code examples have been added to demonstrate the package's functionality, including a sample SQL template and an asynchronous query execution setup.

Improve README code examples for clarity
The README.md file has been updated to enhance the clarity and readability of the code examples. Import statements were reordered for better organization, and additional comments were added to guide users on extending database operations. These changes aim to provide a clearer understanding of the code structure and usage.
Refactor SQL query in select_merchant.sql.jinja and update .gitignore and pyproject.toml for improved project structure and dependencies
Refactor PostgreSQL connection handling and update Makefile for dependency installation using uv
Refactor database connection handling to use configuration from config.ini and update Makefile for improved dependency management

Update README and configure Ruff for linting
Updated the README.md to include instructions for setting up the development environment and running tests. The pyproject.toml was modified to configure Ruff for linting, replacing flake8 and black. The Makefile was updated to reflect these changes, ensuring that Ruff is used for both linting and formatting tasks. These changes aim to streamline the development workflow and improve code quality.

Linting
Refactored imports and standardized string quotes across multiple files for consistency and readability. Updated the Makefile to include a default target for streamlined project setup and execution.
Remove redundant help target from Makefile
Rename PostgresAsync to PgJinja and update references for consistency
Rename PostgresAsync to PgJinja and update references for consistency
